A '''Bolton soldier''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 3|third season]]. He is played by guest star [[Gary Lightbody]] and only appears in "[[Walk of Punishment]]".
sections.Biography:
===Background===
This soldier is fighting for [[House Bolton]] in the [[War of the Five Kings]].

===[[Season 3]]===
He is a member of the force led by [[Locke]] and is present when they capture [[Jaime Lannister]] and [[Brienne of Tarth]]. As they ride through the woods, he leads the other soldiers in singing a rendition of "[[The Bear and the Maiden Fair (song)|The Bear and the Maiden Fair]]".<ref>"[[Walk of Punishment]]"</ref>
